title.rendered: 12 Pack, BSN Medical Soffban Synthetic 15cm x 2.7m Orthopaedic Padding

content.rendered:
Soffban# is a comfortable, soft and smooth orthopaedic padding. It features a high loft for maximum cushioning and protection and feathers out easily, giving the padding a smooth finish.

Soffban is highly conformable for easy shaping around awkward body contours and joints. The padding is resistant to moisture absorbency, minimising the risk of skin maceration. Soffban is easily tear able for quick, trouble-free application and is also autoclavable, making it suitable for use in theatre or sterile procedures.

  • For use under casts.
  • Provides maximum cushioning and protection.
  • It feathers out easily, giving the padding a smooth finish.
  • Highly conformable for easy shaping around awkward body contours and joints.
  • Water-resistant, minimising the risk of skin maceration.
  • Easily tearable for quick, trouble-free application.
  • Clings to itself, allowing the torn feathering to blend naturally for a smooth, even finish.
  • Autoclavable – Suitable for use in theatre or sterile procedures.
  • Size: 15cm x 2.7m.
  • Pack of 12.
